features: REINFORCED WITH DIAMONDS: Metal utensil safe, GreenPan's original diamond-infused nonstick coating offers remarkable durability, balanced heating, and effortless cleanup.
TOXIN-FREE: GreenPan's Thermolon healthy ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium
TOUGH ALUMINUM BODIES: The heavy-duty aluminum construction offers extreme strength with quick and even heating every single time.
BUILT FOR OVEN COOKING: Oven and broiler safe up to 600°F and suitable for all stovetops, except induction.
ERGONOMIC HANDLES: This set’s riveted stainless steel handles offer a sturdy and comfortable grip.
EASY TO CLEAN: These pans are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup, but most messes will wipe clean.
body.description: Get to your meal faster with GreenPan Swift. Crafted from quick-heating aluminum, this collection delivers outstanding heat transfer and stunning performance. These pans are finished with our healthy ceramic nonstick coating for unparalleled performance and effortless cleanup. The perfect fried egg, crispy shrimp, mouthwatering seared meat or a homemade pan pizza—everything’s easy to transfer with the drip-free pouring rims. The sturdy stainless steel handles give you total control. Dishwasher safe. Oven safe to 600°F. Limited lifetime warranty. Cookware set includes: 8” frypan and 10” frypan

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GREENPAN SWIFT CERAMIC NONSTICK COLLECTION, AMAZON EXCLUSIVE

MAKE IT FAST SWIFT Get to your meal faster with GreenPan Swift. Crafted from quick-heating aluminum, this collection delivers outstanding heat transfer and stunning performance. This collection features GreenPan's healthy ceramic nonstick coating for unparalleled performance and effortless cleanup. Plus, the perfect fried egg, crispy shrimp, mouthwatering seared meat or a homemade pan pizza—everything’s easy to transfer with the drip-free pouring rims. TOXIN-FREE: FREE OF PFAS & PFOA HEALTHY CERAMIC NONSTICK GreenPan's signature ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium so you can make any meal healthier. ULTRA-FAST COOKING QUICK-HEATING ALUMINUM Versatile and durable, this collection is designed to heat quickly so you can focus on the flavor. OVEN & BROILER SAFE POLISHED STAINLESS STEEL HANDLE The riveted, ergonomic design of this durable handle gives you a secure and comfortable grip. It's also oven safe up to 600°F. WIPES & RINSES CLEAN EASY CLEANUP Whether you're cooking breakfast, lunch, or dinner, this versatile pair can make easier.

Previous page QUICK-HEATING BODIES Scratch-resistant and dishwasher safe CERAMIC NONSTICK Our healthy ceramic nonstick is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium POLISHED HANDLES Shiny stainless steel handles are ergonomic and oven safe FORGED BASE A tough, thick base prevents warping and is suitable for all stovetops, except induction Tempered Glass Lid Keep an eye on your food without sacrificing heat. Oven safe up to 425°F. Next page POTS & PANS THAT ADD SLEEK STYLE TO YOUR STOVETOP 1 Body 2 Coating 3 Handle 4 Base 5 Lid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these pans!
reviews.reviewText: They still look like new. So easy to clean and cook in. We don't fry in them and only use silicone cooking utensels. It is recommended not to cook anything on high heat, like frying, so we use other pans for that. Great for all other cooking. Nothing sticks and they are very easy to clean. I feel the coating is healthier than some of the other non-stick pans. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars COOKS EVERYTHING PERFECTLY!!!
reviews.reviewText: First off I was skeptical but the second I started using these frying pans I fell in LOVE! I was amazed at how evenly they cooked, how fast they heat up and are easier to clean than a window!!! I cook steaks, eggs, souffles, toasted cheese sandwiches etc. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU GIVE THESE A TRY!!!! I can promise you will NOT BE LET DOWN!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite brand for pots & pans
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite green brand for pots and pans. Super affordable and the non-stick works really well. Be careful to follow directions and don’t use excess heat or oils/sprays on the pans to maintain the non-stick. One of my pans was ruined due to excess heat and oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and easy clean up
reviews.reviewText: These pans are divine… cook so evenly without sticking! Love these pans! Recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value - Do not use Spray Oil on them
reviews.reviewText: Pans are okay. Doesnt last very long. Next time will spend more to get a better pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First use of ceramics...
reviews.reviewText: So far (one month of daily use)...so very good! I read the instructions that indicate you should not use high heat with these pans but I have a flat-top electric range and I use high heat always in order to get up to proper temperature, and then I descend to 8-7 (out of 10).Absolutely no problems. Great heat distribution; no discoloration and the clean-up is ridiculously easy. Fried eggs just glide...BUT let me see if this holds for 6 months..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product all around
reviews.reviewText: Love these pans!!! They cook evenly and have zero issues with things sticking. I just turn the burner on medium for about 1-2 min to get the pan warmed up then turn on low and it’s perfect to cook in!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly non stick !!!
reviews.reviewText: Truly no stick pan! Food slides out!!
